name: .H6X File Extension
summary: Learn about .H6X files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An H6X file is a data file used by Soft6502 Trainer/Simulator, a program that simulates the behavior of a single board 650 computer. It contains 6502 code and data that can be saved and loaded at a later time.

content: The H6X file stores 6502 code in ASCII text format, which allows the file to be edited by any text editor. The file is made up of a sequence of addresses and hexadecimal opcode. The format uses the first 4 hex digits on each line to specify the current address, which is followed by 1 to 16 code bytes that consist of 2 hex digits each. The format is designed to be easy to understand, create and edit.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
